message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice! However, I'm looking to save as much as possible. Would you be willing to consider a price of $75 for the product?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $82. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. What do you think?
Thank you for meeting me halfway, Alice! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to consider a price of $78 for the product?
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob! I can offer the product to you for $81. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice! I'm getting close to your lowest offer, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to consider a price of $79 for the product?

I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I think $81 is a fair price for this amazing product. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm going to have to consider other options. Would you like to make a final offer?
